h2: Help us save the endangered Spectacled Flying Fox!
heading: Join us on Patreon
ctaText: We are still setting up our Patreon. This will give Patreon subscribers access to exclusive content.  If you would like to help us manage this please let us know.  In the meantime, we need to raise awareness. Why not join BatSoc as a member https://forms.gle/QKUyjaT7jKsWnLto6 or as a volunteer? Send us a message. And follow us on FaceBook and Instagram.
